What's in this version : (Updated : Sep 14, 2012)

    Text Utilities -> Merged word lengths + occurences into statistics
    Text Utilities -> Statistics -> Average word length
    Text Utilities -> Statistics -> Characters without spaces
    Menu>backup/restore->Auto backup - automatically backup database to SD on app exit.

Required Android O/S : 1.6+
